markdownRemark.html:
I decided to cancel my O'Reilly account, sending them this message:

You shouldn't market videos to people who can't access them. That was a bad move. I like your books though, keep on writing quality reference materials.

When canceling, I noticed they offer a less expensive account: $9.99 / month for access to five books on your bookshelf at a time.

frontmatter.title: Cancelled O Reilly s Safari Account
